subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
Preakness Stakes
Kentucky Derby
Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: When no horse sweeps the Triple Crown, people tend to dismiss the group, but this year’s crop gives horse racing fans of all levels plenty of reasons to stay interested through the summer.
snippet: When no horse sweeps the Triple Crown, people tend to dismiss the group, but this year’s crop gives horse racing fans of all levels plenty of reasons to stay interested through the summer.
